thread.section_title: Viagogo Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Viagogo | www.viagogo.ie
thread.title: Allan Mcilquham

author: Allan Mcilquham
title: Allan Mcilquham
text: purchased tickets to Bruce Springsteen concert at Hunter Valley Australia. They were selling for $150 Australian dollars was charged U K pounds total price $560. Did not receive an email to down load tickets after sending many emails, and no response from Viagogo had to make 4 calls to U K and a total of 5 hours before finally getting them to email tickets that were received at 11 pm the night before travelling to the event.! Absolutely discussed with this company the experience left me financially worse off and very stressed.Would never use them again.
